title: Pass on Spiritual Blessings
itunes:title: Pass on Spiritual Blessings
description:
When you take time to make your children feel loved, you are passing on a spiritual blessing. It’s never too late to bless your children. Your approval can make a powerful difference in their lives. Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
